title: The Blogger's Survival Guide: Tips and Tricks for Parent Bloggers, Wordsmiths and Enthusiasts
description: Eliminate hours of research involved in creating a successful, money-making blog.  Blogging can be a lot of fun, but much better if some income is generated from it. This guide will help your blog succeed. It delivers all the instructions youâ€™ll need to pursue and achieve your online goals.  Topics include: --Understanding the different blogging platforms --Creating compelling blog content --The different elements that drive traffic to your blog --Understanding the different forms of social media and much more!  Foreword written by Angela Santomero Creator/Executive Producer/Head Writer Blue's Clues, Super Why! & Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
author: Lexie   Lane
